knimeNode.name: Mangler
knimeNode.shortDescription: Mangles a classical KNIME column into a corresponding MIME file

fullDescription.intro: The Mangler Node will mangle incoming classical KNIME columns into corresponding MIMEFileCell data. To register a Mangler for a MIMEFile use a plugin that delivers a DemanglerProvider for your Demangler by extending the DemanglerProvider extension point.
